topic.title: Convert Version 22 Publishing Templates to Version 23

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Responsive Converting publishing templates to version 23
Publishing Template Converting publishing templates to version 23

body.p: If you have a custom Publishing Template that was created in version 22.0 or 22.1, it is not necessary to convert it to version 23 because there were no structural changes made for the HTML layout files between the two versions.
